scripts.build: webpack && cp ol/v6.3.1/ol.js.map dist && cp status.json dist
scripts.deploy: aws rm s3://${{ secrets.S3_BUCKET }} --recursive && aws s3 cp ./ s3://${ secrets.S3_BUCKET }} --cache-control 'public, max-age=31536000' --recursive && aws configure set preview.cloudfront true && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id ${{ secrets.CLOUDFRONT_ID }} --paths '/*';
